name: Rewind (itch) (panzorfork)
description:
A game made for the Idle Thumbs' Winter Wizard Jam 2015.

Did you ever wish you could rewind time?

Did you ever wish you could rewind time?

Did you ever wish you could rewind time?

Controls:

Move left: A | ←

Move right: D | →

Jump: Space

Rewind time: Z (hold)

Restart game: R

Elektric music by ElektricWizard

aka Metal Tiger https://soundcloud.com/metal-tiger
